description: This table stores appointment-level exam information.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the order record associated with this procedure order.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: APPT_STUDY_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The imaging study status category ID for an order linked to an appointment (Ordered, No Show, Scheduled, etc).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Ordered


No Show


Scheduled


Arrived


Exam Begun


Procedure Started


Discontinued


Procedure Finished


Exam Ended


----- BEGIN READING PALETTE STATUSES -----


Tech Complete


Tech Revise


Resident Revise


Saved


Queued In Trans


In Transcription


Incomplete Transcription


Transcribed


Wet Read


Queued Prelim


Preliminary


Queued Needs Review


Needs Review


Revised


Queued Final


Final


Cadence Non-Imaging Order

columns.name: APPT_EXAM_BGN_DATE
columns.description: The beginning date for an appointment exam.

columns.name: APPT_EXAM_BGN_TIME
columns.description: The beginning time for an appointment exam.

columns.name: APPT_EXAM_END_DATE
columns.description: The exam end date for multiple appointments scheduled with a single order (such as in nuclear medicine, where a single order would be associated with two exams, for an image and a delayed image).

columns.name: APPT_EXAM_END_TIME
columns.description: The exam end time for multiple appointments scheduled with a single order (such as in nuclear medicine, where a single order would be associated with two exams, for an image and a delayed image).

columns.name: APPT_TECH_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the lead technologist for multiple appointments scheduled with a single order (such as in nuclear medicine, where a single order would be associated with two exams, for an image and a delayed image).
